1: -module(mylib_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:     [ {exports, Functions} | _ ] = ?MODULE:module_info(),
    9:     [ FName || {FName, _} <- lists:filter(
   10:                                fun ({module_info,_}) -> false;
   11:                                    ({all,_}) -> false;
   12:                                    ({init_per_suite,1}) -> false;
   13:                                    ({end_per_suite,1}) -> false;
   14:                                    ({_,1}) -> true;
   15:                                    ({_,_}) -> false
   16:                                end, Functions)].
   17: 
   18: test_mylib() ->
   19:     [{userdata,[{doc,"Testing the mylib module"}]}].
   20: 
   21: test_mylib(_Config) ->
   22:     {skip,"Not implemented."}.
